name: Boardwalk Carnival Game
description:
Build your own Boardwalk Carnival, attract guests, and create a profitable business. The guests all have individual needs and desires, so be sure to balance your carnival grounds with attractions and facilities to suit each of your guests, and they will rate your carnival well, attracting even more guests.

As you grow your carnival, take a break from the demands of running your business, and visit game booths in your carnival to play and win prizes to invest back into your carnival business.

Do you have what it takes to run a successful Boardwalk Carnival business?
